Name: Zoning, Western Rail Yard Modifications, Manhattan (N 250098 ZRM)
Title: Application number N 250098 ZRM (Western Rail Yards Modifications) submitted by WRY Tenant LLC, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment to the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, modifying APPENDIX F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Manhattan, Community District 4, Council District 3.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
